constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 23 (Monday, February 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DEUTCH:
H.R. 929.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1 of Section 8 of Article I of the U.S. Constitution
and Clause 18 of Section 8 of Article I of the U.S.
Constitution.
[Page H483]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: To provide that the amount of time that an elderly offender must serve before being eligible for placement in home detention is to be reduced by the amount of good time credits earned by the prisoner, and for other purposes.
